metadata.title: CVE-2024-40776 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 16.7.9 and iPadOS 16.7.9, Safari 17.6, iOS 17.6 andiPadOS 17.6, watchOS 10.6, tvOS 17.6, visionOS 1.3, macOS Sonoma 14.6.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to an unexpectedprocess crash.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
